page.title: 08TOURISM IN THE WEDMORE AREA
page.content: In our area there are two hotels, both in Wedmore, three caravan club and one camping site. There are eight Bed and Breakfast houses, giving a total of 14 places for tourists to stay. From the questionaire we discovered the most popular tourist attraction in the local area is Cheddar Gorge, closely followed by Glastonbury and Wells. Other attractions are Wookey Hole and Axbridge. For a day outside the area, thirty-five places were recommended. Bath, Bristol and Weston were the most popular. The majority of people were not involved in tourism . Most are not conscious of the rise in population when tourists arrive.
